snippet: What if it is the weak economy that is driving the fiscal failures in Washington?
abstract: News analysis; some economists think that lack of growth in United States economy is driving fiscal failures of Congress, but political class is focused more on debt and deficit than it is on growth.
lead_paragraph: What if it is the weak economy that is driving the fiscal failures in Washington?

headline.seo: The Low Politics of Economic Growth
headline.main: The Low Politics of Low Growth
headline.print_headline: The Low Politics of Low Growth
